about.title: About the project
about.body: GreenShield Mekong turns water hyacinth and local by‑products into bio-based fruit packaging. Our goals are to cut plastic waste, clean rivers, and create sustainable livelihoods while meeting export logistics and traceability needs. Primary customers are farm cooperatives and exporters seeking greener, cost-effective packaging.
